Mary Nichols on the transition to a decarbonized transportation system

05 Nov 2019, 18:49




Hear from Mary Nichols, the Chair of the California Air Resources Board (CARB), who have spent years guiding, navigating and sometimes battling for a transition to a decarbonized transportation system. At VERGE 19, she discusses the years of prescient policies, changing economics and technology that have paved the way for zero-emission vehicles to become more mainstream.
